title: Rajputana Ruby & Diamond Short Haaram
features: This exquisite short haaram showcases a harmonious blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. The design features circular motifs meticulously set with sparkling CZ diamonds, punctuated by vibrant square-cut rubies that add a regal touch. The gold work exhibits fine craftsmanship, reminiscent of traditional Hyderabadi jewelry techniques. The setting is carefully done to maximize the brilliance of both the rubies and diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of regal elegance to modern evening wear.
description: A timeless piece that embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The vibrant rubies and sparkling diamonds create a captivating contrast, while the intricate gold work reflects superior craftsmanship. This haaram is a valuable addition to any jewelry collection, representing both cultural significance and enduring beauty.
